### Prairie Farm Input Price Survey

#### Notice Number: 01B68-22-0099

#### Publication Date: March 22, 2023

The Government of Canada has issued a Tender Notice for the Prairie Farm Input Price Survey. This Notice solicits proposals from qualified suppliers to provide data on key farm inputs to support economic analysis.

#### Brief Description

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) requires data to support economic analysis of key farm inputs, including fertilizer, fuel, pesticides, and seeds. The data collected will facilitate the understanding of the current cost environment facing Canadian producers, assess the effects of farm policies and industrial policies in Canada and the U.S., and assess structural changes taking place in the farm sector and inputs sector.

#### Details

* **Duration of Contract:** The contract will commence upon award and continue until March 31, 2026, with the option of two additional years.
* **Data Collection:** The data will be collected on a regional basis in Canada and the U.S.
* **Security Clearance:** There is no security clearance required for this project.
* **Trade Agreements:** The contract is subject to the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and bidders must include the applicable requirements in the proposal.

#### Eligibility Criteria

To be eligible to respond to this Request for Proposal (RFP), suppliers must demonstrate experience and expertise in collecting and analyzing farm input price data. Bidders must also meet all the requirements outlined in the solicitation documentation.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The proposals will be evaluated on the basis of the bidder's experience, methodology, and technical capabilities. A respondent information questionnaire (RIQ) will be issued to shortlisted bidders to provide additional information.

#### Tender Closing Date: May 12, 2023

All submissions must be received by May 12, 2023, at 14:00 Eastern Time.
